name: DarkLightDeath
description:
For VR Supper Jam. A dark puzzle game with a lighter side, or at least lightsaber. (Using two assets from Cloudwalker so feel like a lightsaber is needed) The house needs help. You are its only hope. See the light and dark side of life and help the house collect another soul. 

Lots of assets used. Here are main ones. 

https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/tools/physics/hurricane-vr-physics-interac...

https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/tools/physics/hexabody-vr-player-controlle...

https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/tools/physics/dinofracture-a-dynamic-fract...

Graphics 

https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/characters/humanoids/survivor-girl-1-20...

https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/environments/historic/victorian-interio...

Music

https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/audio/music/orchestral/ultimate-game-music...

Few other assets but these are main ones.
